metadata.description: A curated collection of Claude Code plugins by Thomas Klok Rohde

plugins.name: drawio
plugins.description: Create production-ready DrawIO diagram files with comprehensive XML knowledge for flowcharts, architecture diagrams, UML, network diagrams, and more

plugins.name: jarchi
plugins.description: Commands and skills for jArchi scripting: automate Archi models, views, and exports

plugins.name: archimate
plugins.description: ArchiMate enterprise architecture modeling assistance - element selection, relationships, patterns, and model quality guidance

plugins.name: copilot-customization
plugins.description: Create, scaffold, and configure GitHub Copilot customizations for VS Code projects, including instructions, prompts, agents, skills, hooks, and MCP integration
